name: Super Double Yakuman II
overview: The fifth game in the Double Yakuman series, though only the second to be released on Super Famicom. It is a barebones budget mahjong game intended to cut to the chase, with a selection of opponents to choose from before moving straight into a four-person game. In comparison to many other straightforward mahjong games, Super Double Yakuman II has some lighthearted elements, with its silly CPU anime portraits and over-the-top victory celebrations.
